SEARCH
Package com.example.queueup.controllers

Class ImageController

java.lang.Object
com.example.queueup.controllers.ImageController
public class ImageController extends Object
ImageController manages image operations for uploading, retrieving, and deleting images from Firebase Firestore and Storage. It handles tasks such as adding images to storage and Firestore, removing references, and deleting images while updating user information as necessary.
